ygData.subject: Re: Just a thought
ygData.msgSnippet: True, pretty simple system. :)  But I ve read in web discussions about some sort of other system that the monster uses and when you con a monster green, and
ygData.messageBody:
True, pretty simple system. :) But I've read in web discussions about
some sort of "other" system that the monster uses and when you con a monster
green, and thus your pet cons green, it's the same level or some sort of
stuff like that. I don't know. Which I don't mind, I think it makes sense.
But this is the kind of stuff they should've put in an instruction booklet.
It makes it hard to know if our pet is really beneath our level, or if the
green con is truly our same level... as so many have got from their pets.
If anybody has any more info on this, it'd be much more helpful. :-)

~Mysk

--------------------
Consider your. Pet that all the info you need. Green lower then you. Blue...
1 level lower then you. Black same level as you. yellow 1 higher then you.
red... not like thats going to happen... 2 or more levels higher then you .
thats al there is to it!!! :)
